download_app_page.title: Download Our App Now
download_app_page.description: Download our app and enjoy the best and fastest online casino experience on the go. Play your favorite games, deposit and withdraw funds, and get in touch with our support team, all from the palm of your hand.

modal_restrict.expanding_body: Unfortunately, at this time we don't have local deposit options for players from {country}. We're growing as fast as possible and looking to serve you as soon as we can. Check back soon to join the luckiest online casino in the world!
modal_restrict.expanding_subject: Add me to the waitlist in {country} for {blockedDomain}
modal_restrict.license_alternative_headline: Go to {allowedDomain} for the Best Casino Experience in {country}
modal_restrict.license_alternative_body: Due to the restrictions of our gaming license, the url {blockedDomain} cannot accept players located in {country}. However, we can provide you a full unrestricted experience on our dedicated {country} website at {allowedDomain}!
modal_restrict.license_no_alternative_body: Due to the restrictions of our gaming license, the url {blockedDomain} cannot accept players located in {country}. If you think this is a mistake, please check your connection or with your ISP. We apologize for the inconvenience and hope to serve you in the near future.

validation.reason_required: A reason for closing your account is required
validation.username_invalid_characters: Username can contain letters, numbers, and . {'@'} $ # & _ -

withdrawal_limits.summary:
For an easy, secure and simple withdraw process, make sure to remember these: 
- The minimum withdrawal amount varies by method and is listed above. 
- The maximum withdrawal amount varies depending on your total unlocked balance, the payment provider's limits, and others. 
- Withdrawals are always to be processed to the original deposit method unless otherwise specified or if that method doesn't support withdrawals.

page.home: {siteName} · Daily Cash Prizes and VIP Experience

footer.summary: Welcome to The {siteName} Experience the ultimate thrill of online gambling with us. Play slots, poker, blackjack, and more. Win big with our bonuses and promotions.
footer.legal_notice: Prior to engaging in any online gambling activities on our platform, it is imperative to verify that such actions are legally permissible within your jurisdiction. It is your responsibility to ascertain and adhere to the laws and regulations governing online gambling in your country or region.
footer.user_account_language: Your account language is set to {language}.
footer.user_account_language_unknown: Your account language is different to the current language.

console_warning.description: Do not copy/paste ANYTHING in this window. Scammers are trying to steal your password.
